name: Astra's Lost Journey
description:
DESCRIPTION

Come along with Astra as she journeys through & solves puzzles to find her way back home.

Short puzzle platformer game made with Unreal Engine 4.

Average play time 10mins

CREDITS

  • Angelo Estoque - Code
  • Clinton Hui - Asset Artist
  • Cathy Kha - Asset Artist
  • Melinda Sultana - Environment Artist
